content:
Any illumination on this issue greatly appreciated.

In HAPI 3.8, this query:

1) This works:
https://davinci-plan-net-ri.logicahealth.org/fhir/Organization?_has:OrganizationAffiliation:primary-organization:network=Organization/plannet-network-HPID040000
and
2) Gets a 502 Bad Gateway error
https://davinci-plan-net-ri.logicahealth.org/fhir/Location?organization:_has:OrganizationAffiliation:primary-organization:network=Organization/plannet-network-HPID040000

organization is a proper searchParam of Location
